name: wapmorgan/unified-archive
description: UnifiedArchive - unified interface to archive (zip, rar, gz, bz2, xz, tar, tar.gz, tar.bz2, tar.x, tar.Z, iso-9660) for listing, reading, extracting and creation + built-in console packer and unpacker + fully implemented PclZip-like interface (create, listContent, extract, properties, add, delete, merge, duplicate).

suggest.pear/archive_tar: Allows unpack of TAR archives. (strongly recommended)
suggest.ext-zlib: Allows unpack GZ files and tar archives with gzip compression.
suggest.ext-bz2: Allows unpack tar archives with bz2 compression.
suggest.ext-xz: Allows unpack tar archives with lzma2 compression.
suggest.ncompress: Allows unpack tar archives with LZW compression.
